"Weapon Enhancement":
"This explains the process of enhancing old-type weapons.

You can enhance weapons at the Item Lab. The Item Lab is a facility for customizing your weapons and armor units."

"You need the following to perform an upgrade:
・Grinders
・Meseta

Note that they will be consumed in the process of upgrading weapons and armor."
"Upgrading may succeed or it may fail. When it succeeds, item performance improves. When it fails, there is a chance that item performance may decline."
"Upgraded items show a value from +1 to +10 after their name."
